text: Native Hawaiians are the native people of Hawaii. They are a Polynesian group whose ancestors came from what is now French Polynesia. Hawaiians make up 21% of Hawaiiâ€™s total population, though most are mixed. Their original language is the Hawaiian language, but Hawaiian Pidgin or English is more common. == References == Category:Ethnic groups in Oceania Category:Ethnic groups in the United States Category:Polynesia *
title: Native Hawaiians
